frontmatter.title: 2022 - A Rattling Good Year Or My Life's Most Gruesome Failure?
frontmatter.description: Reflecting on the good, bad, and ugly of the past year and consider how to move forward in a positive direction.

frontmatter.title: I moved to Europe for a tech job, mid pandemic
frontmatter.description: Does it make sense to leave a stable job with good pay, friends and families and an almost perfect life to start everything afresh from complete zero in a foreign land?

frontmatter.title: How to learn and retain technical knowledge
frontmatter.description: Ever spent hours learning some technical concepts only to completely forget them later? Here's my framework on technical learning and retention to beat our non-persistent memory.

frontmatter.title: The Myth of Building a Perfect Tech Blog
frontmatter.description: After months of procrastination on building a "perfect" tech blog, I finally let go of all my anxiety and decided to write this article about my learnings behind building a blog.

frontmatter.title: Mastering the Full-stack with JS Superpowers
frontmatter.description: A frontend developer's guide to full stack web development. Sharing a learning checklist I came up with and plan to follow over the next couple months.

frontmatter.title: What the heck is JWT anyway?
frontmatter.description: In this article, we will learn the fundamentals of a JWT token is and how we can benefit from it for authenticating communications between two parties, all of this using vanilla NodeJS and javascript.
